title: Strictly's Saffron Barker and Kelvin Fletcher set off for rehearsals ahead of second live show
text:
They successfully made it through the first vote-off weekend on Strictly Come Dancing.

And Saffron Barker, 19, and Kelvin Fletcher, 35, appeared to be in good spirits as they were spotted leaving their London hotel on Friday morning to set off for last minute rehearsals ahead of the second live show on Saturday.

The You Tuber appeared in high spirits as she gears up to perform the Pasa Doble to The Hunger Games' soundtrack as Movie Week looms closer.

Let's go! Saffron Barker, 19, appeared to be in good spirits as she made her way to last minute rehearsals ahead of the second live Strictly Come Dancing show on Saturday

A chirpy Saffron was casually-clad in white cropped tracksuit bottoms, a black zip-up crop top and white trainers.

Shrugging cropped black bomber jacket over her shoulders, the internet sensation wore her blonde locks in a loose ponytail and accessorised with a silver chain attached to her trousers.

Meanwhile, Kelvin is gearing up to perform the Charleston to Trip A Little Light Fantastic by Lin-Manuel Miranda from Mary Poppins Returns.

The Emmerdale actor strolled along in a navy and grey cotton tracksuit from 11 Degrees and box fresh trainers, while carrying his belongings in a rucksack.

Keeping it casual: Kelvin Fletcher, 35, strolled along in a navy and grey cotton tracksuit from 11 Degrees and box fresh trainers, while carrying his belongings in a rucksack

Tender moments: Kelvin has enlisted the help of his son Milo, 10 months, to rehearse for Movie Week as they twirled around their kitchen in a sweet Instagram clip on Wednesday

The soap star revealed he's enlisted the help of his son Milo, 10 months, to rehearse for Movie Week as they twirled around their kitchen in a sweet Instagram clip on Wednesday.

The actor - who also shares daughter Marnie, three, with wife Eliza Marsland - doted on his adorable child as he enthused he's 'absolutely loving' his dance stint.

Former soap star Kelvin soared to the top of the leaderboard with pro Oti Mabuse on the BBC competition series in the opening week, has since been keen to maintain his stellar performances by honing in his footwork with his sweet son.

'I won't disappoint': The fitness enthusiast revealed the Mary Poppins remake holds a special place in his family's heart as the movie marked his youngest kid's first cinema experience

Delighted: 'So I’ll be doing my best and making sure I don’t disappoint! I’m absolutely LOVING this #strictly experience I feel so lucky...', he said

Beaming with delight, the media personality leapt across his kitchen while rubbing his face against a cheery Milo.

The fitness enthusiast revealed the Mary Poppins remake holds a special place in his family's heart as the movie marked his youngest kid's first cinema experience.

Kelvin captioned the clip: 'Little Milo has been helping me with rehearsals for this weekend’s #MarryPoppinsReturns Charleston!

'This soundtrack and this song especially has been on loop in our house for the last few months since taking Marnie to the cinema (her first cinema trip) to watch it.

'So I’ll be doing my best and making sure I don’t disappoint! I’m absolutely LOVING this #strictly experience I feel so lucky ❤️ @bbcstrictly', he added.
description: The You Tuber, 19, appeared in high spirits as she was spotted leaving her London hotel on Friday morning to set off for last minute rehearsals ahead of the second live show on Saturday
